channel.title: Please help. [317] client error when i run and log in
channel.description:
i posted this in client questions also but no one ever goes there so please help.
ok i downloaded i think a client called blurr, and i changed the ip in the GUI file to my ip then compiled and tryed to run. and it said no errors and i logged in to black screen then instantly logged out and on my client run it said this:
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
How do i fix it?
